response.original_title: The Sleepeasy Solution: The Complete Guide to Getting Your Baby or Toddler to Sleep
response.overview: The Sleepeasy Solution DVD allows you to bring us—your own personal sleep coaches—right into your living room! Just as we do in our private sleep consultations, we will show you why your child isn’t sleeping, walk you step by step through how to teach your child to sleep through the night and take great naps, and offer you the same emotional support and coaching normally available only to families who work with us in person.
response.title: The Sleepeasy Solution: The Complete Guide to Getting Your Baby or Toddler to Sleep
